languages.text: Получить {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}металлолом{/g} из {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}компонента корабля{/g} возможно только в том случае, если ранее вы установили улучшение этого компонента. Старайтесь всегда иметь в запасе достаточно металлолома, чтобы не пришлось жертвовать важными деталями для ремонта.

You can only obtain {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from ship {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} if you have previously installed an upgrade for that component. Try to keep enough spare scrap on hand so as not to find yourself in a situation where you are forced to sacrifice critical ship parts for repairs.
languages.original_text: Получить {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}металлолом{/g} из {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}компонента корабля{/g} возможно только в том случае, если ранее вы установили улучшение этого компонента. Старайтесь всегда иметь в запасе достаточно металлолома, чтобы не пришлось жертвовать важными деталями для ремонта.

traits.locale_text: You can only obtain scrap from ship components if you have previously installed an upgrade for that component. Try to keep enough spare scrap on hand so as not to find yourself in a situation where you are forced to sacrifice critical ship parts for repairs.

You can only obtain scrap from ship components if you have previously installed an upgrade for that component. Try to keep enough spare scrap on hand so as not to find yourself in a situation where you are forced to sacrifice critical ship parts for repairs.

You can only obtain scrap from ship components if you have previously installed an upgrade for that component. Try to keep enough spare scrap on hand so as not to find yourself in a situation where you are forced to sacrifice critical ship parts for repairs.

You can only obtain {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from ship {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} if you have previously installed an upgrade for that component. Try to keep enough spare scrap on hand so as not to find yourself in a situation where you are forced to sacrifice critical ship parts for repairs.

You can only obtain {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from ship {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} if you have previously installed an upgrade for that component. Try to keep enough spare scrap on hand so as not to find yourself in a situation where you are forced to sacrifice critical ship parts for repairs.

languages.text: Solo puedes obtener {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}chatarra{/g} a partir de los {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}componentes{/g} de la nave si has instalado una mejora para el componente correspondiente. Intenta tener siempre suficiente chatarra para no acabar en una situación en la que debas sacrificar componentes esenciales de la nave para repararla.
languages.original_text: You can only obtain {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from ship {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} if you have previously installed an upgrade for that component. Try to keep enough spare scrap on hand so as not to find yourself in a situation where you are forced to sacrifice critical ship parts for repairs.

traits.locale_text: Solo puedes obtener {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}chatarra{/g} a partir de los componentes de la nave si has instalado una mejora para el componente correspondiente. Intenta tener siempre suficiente chatarra para no acabar en una situación en la que debas sacrificar componentes esenciales de la nave para repararla.

languages.text: 船の{g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}部品{/g}から{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}スクラップ{/g}を入手できるのは、その部品のアップグレードをインストールしたことがある場合のみだ。修理のために船の重要な部品を犠牲にせざるを得ない状況に陥らないよう、十分な予備スクラップを手元に置いておくようにしよう。
languages.original_text: You can only obtain {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from ship {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} if you have previously installed an upgrade for that component. Try to keep enough spare scrap on hand so as not to find yourself in a situation where you are forced to sacrifice critical ship parts for repairs.

traits.locale_text: 船の部品から{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}スクラップ{/g}を入手できるのは、その部品のアップグレードをインストールしたことがある場合のみである。修理のために船の重要な部品を犠牲にせざるを得ない状況に陥らないよう、十分な予備のスクラップを手元に置いておくようにしよう。

languages.text: 只有安装了某个{g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}部件{/g}的升级设备之后，才可以将升级设备拆除，换取{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}废料{/g}。请尽量始终保持足够备用的废料，以免在维修舰船时被迫牺牲关键的舰船部件。
languages.original_text: You can only obtain {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from ship {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} if you have previously installed an upgrade for that component. Try to keep enough spare scrap on hand so as not to find yourself in a situation where you are forced to sacrifice critical ship parts for repairs.

traits.locale_text: 只有安装了某个部件的升级设备之后，才可以将升级设备拆除，换取{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}废料{/g}。请尽量始终保持足够备用的废料，以免在维修舰船时被迫牺牲关键的舰船部件。

languages.text: Du kannst nur {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}Schrott{/g} von {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}Schiffskomponenten{/g} erhalten, wenn du zuvor ein Upgrade für diese Komponente installiert hast. Versuche, genügend Ersatzschrott vorrätig zu haben, damit du nicht in die Situation kommst, dass du wichtige Schiffsteile für Reparaturen opfern musst.
languages.original_text: You can only obtain {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from ship {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} if you have previously installed an upgrade for that component. Try to keep enough spare scrap on hand so as not to find yourself in a situation where you are forced to sacrifice critical ship parts for repairs.

traits.locale_text: Du kannst nur {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}Schrott{/g} von Schiffskomponenten erhalten, wenn du zuvor ein Upgrade für diese Komponente installiert hast. Versuche, genügend Ersatzschrott vorrätig zu haben, damit du nicht in die Situation kommst, dass du wichtige Schiffsteile für Reparaturen opfern musst.

languages.text: Vous ne pouvez obtenir des {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}pièces de récupération{/g} à partir des {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}composants{/g} du vaisseau que si vous avez préalablement installé une amélioration pour ce composant. Veillez à conserver suffisamment de pièces de récupération pour ne pas devoir sacrifier de pièces essentielles du vaisseau à des fins de réparation.
languages.original_text: You can only obtain {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from ship {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} if you have previously installed an upgrade for that component. Try to keep enough spare scrap on hand so as not to find yourself in a situation where you are forced to sacrifice critical ship parts for repairs.

traits.locale_text: Vous ne pouvez obtenir des {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}pièces de récupération{/g} à partir des composants du vaisseau que si vous avez préalablement installé une amélioration pour ce composant. Veillez à conserver suffisamment de pièces de récupération pour ne pas devoir sacrifier des pièces essentielles du vaisseau à des fins de réparation.
